bibl.title: Actresses in the Roman World.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Summary in DA 65 (2004-2005) p. 4550-A. - Prosopographical register (150 entries), based on evidence from literature, law, epigraphy, papyrology and art.
bibl.seg: STARKS John H., Jr., Actresses in the Roman World.
